name: Instinctual Interception
summary: You react to movement with hardly a thought, seeming constantly poised to spring.
description:
You react to movement with hardly a thought, seeming constantly poised to spring. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to Interrupt Charge.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: A foe's Strike reduces you to 0 Hit Points.
